text: Pas, dar hole ki u [Zakarijo] istoda dar iʙodatgoh namoz mexond, faristagon nidojas dodand, ki: "Alloh taolo turo ʙa [vilodati] Jahjo ʙasorat medihad, [ki] tasdiqkunandai kalimai Alloh taolo [Iso] ast va [dar ilmu iʙodat, ʙar qavmi xes] sarvar ast va porsost [ʙa sahavot tavaccuhe nadorad] va pajomʙare az soistagon ast
